name: ONE (itch) (JuneGames)
description:
ONE

Humanity collapsed 500 years ago by the nuclear blast.
You are ONE member of the humanity reconstruction program.

You need to find all the memory fragments all over the ruined city.
The Artifacts.
You’ll have to face animals in your way, some of them are neutral but the others will attack you when they can.

You only have ONE question in your head.
"Is this real ?"

Follow me on twitter :
https://twitter.com/BelabedIlias
